## Original Data Table {.smaller .scrollable}

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
load("defence_data/2data_table.RData")
kbl(JazzMusiciansData)  %>%
  row_spec(1:10, color = "black")%>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"),
                font_size = 18)
rm(list = ls())
```
